/* eslint-disable no-unused-vars */ import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import { Player } from 'video-react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import styles from './CourseDetails.module.scss' import LogoFlutter from '../../../assets/images/LogoFlutter.svg' import AvatarMeng from '../../../assets/images/AvatarMeng.svg' import VideoDetailComponent from '../VideoDetailComponent/VideoDetailComponent' import { URL } from '../../../configs' import { ParseTimeToMinuteAndSecond } from '../../../utils' const CourseDetails = (props) => { const { location } = props const token = useSelector((value) => value?.userReducer?.token) const [videoPath, setVideoPath] = useState('/publish/videos/01.UIDesignforDevelopers.mp4') const [videoTitle, setVideoTitle] = useState('') const arrVideos = useSelector((value) => value?.coursesReducer?.arrayVideosOfCourse) console.log('===============================================') console.log('location State', location?.state) console.log('arrVideos', arrVideos) console.log('===============================================') const history = useHistory() const [isModalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false) const handleVideoClick = (item) => { setVideoPath(item.video) setVideoTitle(item.tieuDe) } const handleCloseClick = () => { setModalShow(false) } return (
